channel.title: Damienbod.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Damienbod.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Using Elasticsearch with .NET Aspire
item.description: This post shows how to use Elasticsearch in .NET Aspire. Elasticsearch is setup to use HTTPS with the dotnet developer certificates and and simple client can be implemented to query the data. Code: https://github.com/damienbod/keycloak-backchannel Setup Two services are setup to run in .NET Aspire. The first service is the official Elasticsearch docker container and deployed […] Link to article: https://damienbod.com/2024/09/16/using-elasticsearch-with-net-aspire/

item.title: Implement OpenID Connect Back-Channel Logout using ASP.NET Core, Keycloak and .NET Aspire
item.description: This post shows how to implement an OpenID Connect back-channel logout using Keycloak, ASP.NET Core and .NET Aspire. The Keycloak and the Redis cache are run as containers using .NET Aspire. Two ASP.NET Core UI applications are used to demonstrate the server logout. Code: https://github.com/damienbod/keycloak-backchannel Setup The applications are run and tested using .NET Aspire. […] Link to article: https://damienbod.com/2024/09/09/implement-openid-connect-back-channel-logout-using-asp-net-core-keycloak-and-net-aspire/
